rooms.name: Entryway
rooms.tutorial: To navigate the dungeon, you can say "move", "go", or "proceed". You will need to pair this command with a direction. Since the only available direction is East, try typing "go east" (without the quotes).

rooms.name: Guard Room
rooms.tutorial: Uh-oh - there's a monster in this room. You can retreat, but you won't be able to proceed further until you've defeated him. Try typing: "fight" (no quotes).

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.tutorial: There's not much going on with this room. It's just a 3-way connector.

rooms.name: Miniboss Room
rooms.description: Has the miniboss and dungeon item.
rooms.tutorial: This room has a very important item that you'll want to *loot*. First, you'll need to fight the mini-boss. Then "loot" to get the boots.

rooms.name: Chasm Room
rooms.description: There is a huge chasm in the room.
rooms.tutorial: If you can't figure out how to deal with the chasm you might need to go *back* or *retreat*.

rooms.name: Chasm Treasure Room
rooms.description: There's some treasure across the chasm.
rooms.tutorial: If you can't figure out how to deal with the chasm you might need to go *back* or *retreat*.

rooms.name: Riddle Room
rooms.description: You must answer the riddle before you can pass.
rooms.tutorial: To answer a riddle you will need to *say* the answer. To speak you can type: "say "riddle answer" " (don't include the outer quotes but do include quotes around what you want to say). As for solving the riddle... think about that great new item you just got.

obstacles.name: Sphinx Riddle
obstacles.riddle: Two brothers we are, great burdens we bear. All day we are bitterly pressed. Yet this we will say, we are full all the day, and empty when we go to rest.

rooms.name: Monsters After Riddle Room
rooms.description: The monsters are angry you got past the riddle.

rooms.name: Healing Fountain
rooms.description: This room has a healing fountain. How nice.
rooms.tutorial: This might be a good time to try *search* out. Maybe search around the room's only feature? You can also take a *drink* from the fountain.

rooms.name: Boss Room
rooms.description: The lair of Pihop-pi. It kinda stinks in here.
rooms.tutorial: This is the lair of the dungeon boss. Not yet 100% perfectly implemented. Thanks for playing!
